title: Mobile data usage
content: Anyway of, on an app by app basis, turning off the use of mobile data? I can see you can turn off background data as such but I'm interested in foreground - and I don't want to have to keep switching mobile data on and off manually. Got burnt with WiFi connectivity seemingly dropping and houseparty call using 1gb of mobile data instead , no idea how that happened as in the same router range as had been with previous iPhone 6.
